title: Patch 5.24 store not working
body: whenever i try to go to the store i get this picture of amumu{{champion:32}} . Why is this happening?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hey RoboSpark725! 

Are you still having this issue?
Now it's happening to me. The store is all black except for a tiny white rectangle. Then it'll say "Session Expired". I keep logging out then logging back in but it's no use.
Looks like there was a bit of a hiccup earlier. I just loaded in the store okay. Lemme know if you're still seeing this.
same rito plis. i dont want the sad {{champion:32}}
